doc:
Salli Richardson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salli_Richardson 0 Salli Elise Richardson (born November 23, 1967) is an American television and film actress and director. Richardson is known for her role as Angela in the film A Low Down Dirty Shame and for her role as Dr. Allison Blake on the Syfy comedy-drama series Eureka (2006–2012). She is also known for her voice acting as Elisa Maza on the Disney animated series Gargoyles (1994–1996), and as Viveca Foster on the CBS series Family Law (1999-2002). Richardson also has appeared in a number of films such as A Low Down Dirty Shame (1994), The Great White Hype (1996), Antwone Fisher (2002), Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid (2004) and I Am Legend (2007). She had leading roles in the independent films Pastor Brown (2009), Black Dynamite (2009) and I Will Follow (2010). Salli_Elise_Richardson ( born November_23_,_1967 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actress_and_director . Richardson is_known for her_role as Angela in the_film A_Low_Down_Dirty_Shame and for her_role as Dr._Allison_Blake on the_Syfy_comedy-drama_series_Eureka_(_2006 – 2012_) . She is_also_known for her_voice acting as Elisa_Maza on the_Disney_animated_series_Gargoyles_(_1994 – 1996_) , and as Viveca_Foster on the_CBS_series_Family_Law_(_1999-2002_) . Richardson also has_appeared in a_number of films such_as A_Low_Down_Dirty_Shame_(_1994_) , The_Great_White_Hype_(_1996_) , Antwone_Fisher_(_2002_) , Anacondas : The_Hunt for the_Blood_Orchid ( 2004_) and I Am Legend_(_2007_) . She had_leading roles in the_independent_films_Pastor_Brown_(_2009_)_,_Black_Dynamite ( 2009_) and I Will_Follow (_2010_) .
